test_browser_title_description: Check your browser compatibility with the WebRTC service.
browser_warning_message: For the best user experience on WebRTC, please use : Chrome, Firefox or Chromium.
browser_success_message:
Your browser is compatible with WebRTC.
For the best user experience always use last sable version of your browser.
browser_error_message:
Your browser is not compatible with WebRTC.
Please use one these recommended Browsers.
micro_error_message:
Unable to use your microphone. Please check your microphone system configuration and your browser permission.
Browser error :
camera_error_message:
Unable to use your camera. Please check your camera system configuration and your browser permission.
Browser error :
devices_error_message: Unable to list your media devices (Audio and Video).
network_success_message: A WebRTC Media connexion has been made with our server.
network_error_message:
Unable to establish a WebRTC media connection to our test server. You should be connected on media restricted network. Please ask you local support to check your network filter rules to our media servers.
Please verify that you have check your browser permission
test_room_error_message:
Unable to detect the connection of your echo media stream.
Please wait 30 seconds before ending the test room.
Please verify that you have right to start a WebRTC webconfrence.
Please verify that you have check your browser permission.
Please verify your local network filter rules to our media servers.
test_room_info_label:
Your login information could be asked by this test.
After login, please wait for 30 seconds to obtain the complete test result.
